SENT.plain: Prevalence and clinical manifestations of 5 common rheumatic diseases in China are discussed
Systemic lupus erythematosus appears to be more prevalent in Chinese than in Caucasians with possibly different clinical manifestations, in particular less serositis
Rheumatoid arthritis may be less aggressive and seronegative arthridities are less common
